node.display_long_description:
Drive, Shoot & Drift like NEVER before.

Key features:
Cross Buy for Rift & Quest
Enhanced Graphics for Quest 2 & 90hz
Over 11 unique tracks and growing
Race up to 8 friends
Offline Story mode
Over 100 hours of Gameplay, Quests & Achievements
All original & unique tracks
Cross-platform play
Cloud save
Regular online tournaments

Extras:
Motion sickness prevention options
Onboarding class for new VR racer
Game for everyone with Casual & Hardcore racing modes
Social with meme, stickers, voice chat & dance moves
Customize every detail from your outfit down to the rim of your car

Coming soon:
More Weapons
More online Tournaments

Dash Dash World is a cross-platform VR kart racing game equipped with immersive full-hand driving and weapon controls. Lose yourself in hundreds of hours of gameplay. Including a fascinating story mode, exhilarating online tournaments, more than a trillion customization combinations, and hundreds of achievements for the trophy hunters out there!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Patch 3.0.0 Release Notes
[Features]
New Training mode
2 Brand new tracks:
Z Enterprises
War of Fame(Extreme track) 
6-8 multiplayer online support
New item: Rich Man‚Äôs Toy!
Adventure Zeitaku mission
Main menu on kart console
Customization 3d shortcut in garage
Character creation in offline mode
Steam version ghost controller

[Bug Fixes]
[Crashes and serious issues]
Crash when entering Character creation scene in Offline mode.
Offline: Player's POV is below the kart in the Garage room.
Race Again button with a party - countdown timer causes another player to return back to the Garage.
Quest 1 FPS drop in Los Muertos track.
Dragon Realms track FPS drop.
Academy - stuck in loading scene after completing a match.
Offline mode Adventure 5 - progression is not updated when switching back to online mode.

[Gameplay]
Comfort mode for new players in New Training stage is missing.
There is a slight frame freeze when Carbo is appearing in License 2.
Y Calibrate button cannot be used in both License 1 & 2.
(Oculus)Pointer is incorrect in Steam.
Obstacles are not spawning on certain tracks.
Received Token count is wrong in Grand Prix mode.
Hand position is wrong when snapping to the glider during flying.
Matchmaking: Error when trying to enter Practice mode as a Party.
Training License 2 - Confetti does not appear at the same time with text box.

[Graphics & VFX]
Assets from older tracks are missing.
License 1 and 2 the edge of the screen has abnormal blue brightness effect
License 2: Item Machine glitch.
Los Muertos track : culling issue when approaching some objects in the track, they will disappear.
Ghost controller in the game introduction scene changes material to unlit.
Missing Stun kart effect when engine overheats during boost start.
Ideon Grotto track in Rift: Wrecking ball glitches.

[UX/UI]
Claim All button in Achievement UI is not working properly.
Score in reward room for DNF player position ranking is incorrect.
Leaderboard tag name is appearing as None.
Can't delete the last mail in the Mail List.
Weapons usage - sometimes weapons size is too small.
Cockpit's item AWAKENTOAST is showing an incorrect image.

[Sound]
License 1 - Sam‚Äôs voice-over does not have a dialog.

[Hardware]
User report : Logitech G29 steering wheel is unable to use with G Hub application.

[Known Issues]
Party Menu - Pop-up Notification Friends name is appearing as none after getting kicked or leaving the party.
Weapons will slide down to the side of the kart after disconnect/reconnecting.
AI is holding PUBP incorrectly.
License 2: Crashcrodile and Denturous explosion animation is missing.
Sticky bomb no animation when grabbing it from the weapons feeder box.
War of Fame track(Online) Gun Tower Leg location is inconsistent.
War of Fame track Gun Tower is not moving or aiming at players.
Garage lighting is very dim.
Offline mode: Reconnect button is blinking.

nodes.title: Unlock all of the Seasonal Exclusive Items in Circuit Wonder Tournament today!
nodes.body_text:
Challenge yourself during this winter in FROSTY SEASON ‚òÉÔ∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è

Complete 30 new challenges throughout this season with 3 competitive events. üèéüí¶

Your chance to unlock all-new 26 limited exclusive items during this season ONLY!



Full Throttle (LIVE NOW)



Become a Drift King in Dash Dash and show that you own the race by completing 10 new challenging drifting quests.

Jump in the Full Throttle event from 28th ( 00.00 am PDT) January - 10th (11.59 pm PDT) February 2021

Here are 10 new challenging quests to complete üòé

- Victory Hunting I/II/III/IV - Sustain the drift for at least 4/5/6/7 seconds.
- Drift Maniac I/II/III - Fill the Nitro gauge with a single drift 40/80/120 times.
- Initial Dash Dash - Collect 200 secs or more drift time in any mode.
- Initial Dash Rush - Collect 50 secs or more drift time in single race mode.
- Initial Dash GP - Collect 150 secs or more drift time in any mode.
- Secret Dasher I - Collect 555 secs or more drift time in any mode.
- Secret Dasher II - Sustain the drift for at least 9 secs

Circuit Wonder



Race in 6 wonderful circuits with 10 new quests and meet Dash Dash Academy members during the Circuits Wonder event. üèé  üó∫

Who knows you might face some Top Racers from Dash Dash Academy. So watch out cause they won‚Äôt go easy on you!

Circuits Wonder event starting TODAY until 27 January 2021

Here are 10 new challenging quests to complete:

- Victory Hunting I/II/III/IV -  Tier 90%/70%/30%/10% on Seasonal Leaderboard.
- Alpaca Brawl - Beat Special Character in Monte Alpaca 2 times.
- Mad Liberty - Beat Special Character in Liberty Circuit 5 times.
- Kabo Dojo Havoc - Beat Special Character in Kabo Dojo 2 times.
- The Witness Meddy - Beat Special Character in Ideon Grotto 2 times.
- Mariachi Smash Down - Beat Special Character in Los Muertos 5 times.
- Evopolis Era - Best Special Character in Evopolis 5 times.

Immersive Festa (Ended)



Now it‚Äôs your chance to improve your immersive driving skills with new 10 immersive quests to complete.  üí™

Immersive Festa event starts TODAY until  12th January 2021 (11.59 pm PDT)

Here are 10 new challenging quests to complete:

- Victory Hunting I/II/III/IV - Top 90/70/30/10% on Seasonal Leaderboard.
- The Showdown - Win 3 race while playing using the Immersive control.
- Triple Xtreme -  Place top 3 in extreme track while using super immersive control 3 times (any track)
- Nitro Dash - Nitro 10 times in a single race while using super immersive control.
- The Survivor - Wipe egg, dino carbo, and carbo cracker off-screen while using super immersive control.
- Dash Store - Consume all Dash Products in a single race while using super immersive control (Bar, Bull, and Max).
- Shoot and Drive - Hit 3 racers with a single Terminator Jr. while using super immersive control.



View the Tournament trailer on Youtube here. And as always, there is a Redeem code hidden in our video ;)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UWcdmi6XzoI

node.reviewDescription: I dropped a good 10 hours into this game and wanted to play it with my children.  We get them a quest and link the account to mine since I don‚Äôt allow them to have Facebook.  We go to play together and the game kicks off the first user.  I‚Äôm not going to go into a long sob story on this, but I will try and frame it for the developer.  When we have guests over and their kids want to play games with mine they turn on Mario kart and you know what happens we get a call from them sometimes asking for Nintendo user name so they can play online with my boys.  Imagine all the other people this happens too.  Too often VR is seen as puzzles or shooting games or gory games.  Games like this are easily overlooked when honestly after playing this Mario cart can‚Äôt compare.  I hope you guys fix this really soon.  I understand the appeal of one user one headset only, but when a game like this blocks themselves from being easily accessible to groups it‚Äôs really sad.  It doesn‚Äôt even have to be online gameplay just local multiple headsets.  This game is better than Mario cart, but with a limiting set up like this it may never take off.  The four star is proof that I truly believe this game is good, but until you allow for multiple headsets per account I cannot go higher.  If you want a great racing game that is not bad on motion sickness this is it.  The game is solid minus that one gripe about local multiple headsets.

developerResponse.body: It is really great to hear you and your guests like the game! We believed that the number of tracks and tutorial is our priority that needs to be addressed asap. We did a survey, and you are right, most people are asking for seamless local matchmaking so that is what we will do next. Please stay tuned!

website_page_meta.description:
Dash Dash is a cross-platform VR racing game with full hand driving and weapons controls.

Over 100 hours of gameplay contents including story mode, regular online tournaments, 100s of achievements and over 1,000,000,000,000 customizable parts.
website_page_meta.title: Dash Dash World ¬∑ Oculus Quest
